channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘This Is Something That Traditional Economics Isn’t Prepared to Deal With’

item.title: Trump Administration Live Updates: Supreme Court Refuses to Allow National Guard Deployment in Chicago

item.title: Vince Zampella, video game pioneer behind megahit Call of Duty, dies at 55
item.description: One of Vince Zampella's crowning achievements was the creation of the Call of Duty franchise, which has sold more than half a billion games worldwide.

item.title: Justice Department releases more Epstein files and some mention Trump
item.description: The Department of Justice has been publicly posting files related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation since Friday.

item.title: Scientists learn more about how human embryos implant using artificial wombs

item.title: Student loan borrowers in default may soon see their wages garnished

item.title: The Confederacy Goes on Trial, Along With Schools Named Jackson and Lee

item.title: Ben Sasse, Former Nebraska Senator, Shares Terminal Pancreatic Cancer Diagnosis
item.description: Mr. Sasse, a former senator from Nebraska, announced that he had received a diagnosis last week for Stage 4 pancreatic cancer.

item.title: France Fails to Adopt a Budget by Year’s End. Again.
item.description: French lawmakers passed a special law on Tuesday to avoid a shutdown until a budget is adopted. Negotiations will resume in January.
